org.openintents.tools.simulator.controller

类 SensorSimulatorController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openintents.tools.simulator.controller.SensorSimulatorController
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.awt.event.WindowListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class SensorSimulatorController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.WindowListener
    SensorSimulatorController keeps the behaviour of the SensorSimulator (listeners, timers, etc.) SensorSimulator simulates various sensors. An Android application can connect through TCP/IP with the settings shown to the SensorSimulator to simulate accelerometer, compass, orientation sensor, thermometer, light, proximity, pressure, gravity, linear acceleration and rotation vector.
    作者:
    Peli, Josip Balic, ilarele
